place.name: THOROTON
place.gazetteerText: THOROTON, a parish in Bingham district, Notts; 2 miles N of Elton r. station, and 4½ NE by E of Bingham. Post town, Nottingham. Acres, 730. Real property, £1,168. Pop., 210. Houses, 43. T. Hall is the residence of G. Storer. The living is a vicarage annexed to Orston. The church is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
